channel.title: Agent on Sujith Quintelier
channel.description: Recent content in Agent on Sujith Quintelier

item.title: github: Assign issues to Copilot coding agent from Raycast
item.description:
GitHub Copilot coding agent can now be assigned issues directly from Raycast, enabling you to delegate tasks to the agent and later review its work.

  • Source: GitHub

item.title: azure: [In preview] Public Preview: Azure Copilot observability agent
item.description:
Azure announced the public preview of the Azure Copilot observability agent — a new agent aimed at giving cloud operations intelligent, scalable observability that provides actionable insights when services aren’t performing as expected.

  • Source: Azure Updates
